title: Can't update League
body: I am having problems updating league. Every time I launch the application it stops at 33% and shows up as an unspecific error. I have basically tried all solutions to get it to work from switching to a wired connection, forcing re-patch, and to uninstalling and re-installing. Is there anything I can do?

replies.body:
Issues at this specific percentage during patching are usually an indication that there are network settings that are preventing your patcher from communicating with the patching servers. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a next step.

Let me know if those steps resolved this issue.
